input: module: do; call r; d = 4-e(4); end;
mod1: do; declare b byte; proc: procedure (e) byte; declare e integer; return e + 1; end proc; declare i integer; call println(b+i-proc(b+i)); end mod1;

do_block: declare b byte ; proc : procedure ( e ) byte ; declare e integer ; return e + 1 ; end proc ; declare i integer ; call println ( b + i - proc ( b + i ) ) ; end mod1 ;
